main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Oklahoma City with a description of a round oval white or luminous yellow object.
interesting points: The object left a tail to the southwest and was noted in an ascending course to the west., The reporting officer identified it as probably a weather balloon., The sighting lasted for over 50 minutes., The observation was made by a traffic clerk using binoculars., Clear weather conditions were present during the observation.
sighted object: round oval white or luminous yellow object
